[https://code.google.com/p/nav6/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fenclosure Design files] for enclosure to help protect and mount the nav6 IMU is made freely available.  These files, in STL (Stereo Lithography) file format, may be printed using a 3D printer.

The enclosure is comprised of two parts:  a "base" and a "lid".
